inputs.remark:
Ordered list: Original text does not include MLR. Missing: attempted speech audiometry, Dichotic Digits Test, Monaural Digit Testing, Late Auditory Evoked Potentials and P300.
V1: Missing pureâ€‘tone audiometry, speech audiometry, monaural digits, P300.

logic_summary: Replaced ordered_list to remove MLR and add Attempted speech audiometry, Monaural Digit Testing, and P300 as per remarks.
Renamed 'Dichotic Digits' to 'Dichotic Digits Test' and 'Late Potentials' to 'Late Auditory Evoked Potentials' in ordered_list to match remarks.
Updated V1 tests to include missing Pure-tone audiometry, Speech audiometry, Monaural digits, and P300.
Maintained MLR in V1 tests as the text explicitly mentions results for Case 7-2, despite the ordered list remark.

value.rationale_short: To assess verbal repetition and description abilities.
To assess ability to repeat numbers.
To assess central auditory function using number stimuli.
To objectively assess cortical auditory processing.

value.name: Pure-tone audiometry
value.result_summary: Not explicitly detailed, but implied sufficient for central testing.

value.name: Speech audiometry
value.result_summary: Patient could not repeat words or verbally describe things accurately.

value.name: Monaural Digit Testing
value.result_summary: Patient could repeat numbers with ease.

value.name: Dichotic Digits Test
value.result_summary: Patient was able to repeat numbers with ease, allowing for successful assessment of central function.

value.name: Middle Latency Response (MLR)
value.result_summary: Demonstrated the 'electrode effect', where the electrode closest to the lesion showed the greatest effect.

value.name: Late Auditory Evoked Potentials
value.result_summary: Demonstrated the 'electrode effect', where the electrode closest to the lesion showed the greatest effect.
